author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Centralize the conversion code of layer type between flat file convention to CMSSW convention for HGCal geometry definition

#### PR validation:

Tested using overlap checking tool for V15 and V16 versions of HGCal geometry

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx313 Centralize the conversion code of layer type between flat file convention to CMSSW convention for HGCal geometry definition
